eventName: Adventure That Cannot Wait for the Sun
storyInfo: The frightened crowd flees and Anat faints in shock. Medjehtiqedti helps organize the evacuation, while Pepe, knowing the reason for the Nameless General's resurrection, comes up with an idea to move the mummy and the unconscious Anat to the curator's office.

attributes.content: Eek!
attributes.name: Panicking Visitor

attributes.content: Th-The mummy is moving!
attributes.name: Frightened Visitor

attributes.content: I'm getting out of here! This place is haunted!
attributes.name: Frightened Visitor

attributes.content: It's looking at me!
attributes.name: Frightened Visitor

attributes.content: I knew it!
attributes.name: Panicking Visitor

attributes.content: This is what happens when a city grows too old!
attributes.name: Panicking Visitor

attributes.content: Everyone! Stay calm! Don't panic!
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: The exit's over here! Stay in line, don't push!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Make way, make way!
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Sorry, excuse me.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: *Sargon expletive* Anat! Anat!
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Medjehtiqedti squeezes through the crowd to find a pale Anat lying limp on the ground, her lips parting weakly as though trying to speak.
But the sight of the mummy cocking its head behind Anat strikes her with such terror that she cannot move her feet.
Titi, go handle the evacuation. I'll try to take Anat and the mummy somewhere else.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Aren't you scared? It's moving!
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: I'm... alright. Ahem. I've been on two Old Calendar tomb excavations this year and met with their residents personally.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: This one looks like a nice old man by comparison.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: It really takes guts to do archaeology, huh? Are you going to be okay by yourself?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Don't worry, it takes plenty of strength to do archaeology too.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Titi...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Anat?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: She's fine... just muttering in her sleep.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: The curator's office isn't far. Go out the side door and avoid the crowds. I'll come find you once the evacuation is complete.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: What's going on? I'm not in my ambush position yet! Did you turn on the smoke early?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: We didn't do anything.
attributes.name: Left Earphone

attributes.content: What's happening?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Seems like someone else is causing a commotion.
attributes.name: Right Earphone

attributes.content: Drat... I didn't see the target in the crowd. Where did she go?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Alright, change of plans. We're starting early. Find her, keep an eye on her, and keep me posted.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Roger.
attributes.name: Right Earphone

attributes.content: Hurry. We need to blend into the crowd once we're done.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: It'll be too late once the evacuation is finished.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Good... everyone is gone...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Pepe approaches the mummy and sees a blue light glowing in its chest.
The gem has vanished into the light and is nowhere to be seen.
Hrmph. So it was the gem...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: It's not easy to carry you like this...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: After observing the mummy for a few seconds, Pepe decides to push the mummy's raised left arm back down.
(Pushes the left arm down)
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: (Raises right arm)
attributes.name: Nameless Mummy

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: (Pushes the right arm down)
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: (Raises left arm)
attributes.name: Nameless Mummy

attributes.content: What's going on with you?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Pepe cocks her head and ponders how to get the mummy to cooperate.
To her surprise, she finds that the mummy also cocks its head, as if in thought.
Wait... are you copying me?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Pepe takes a step to the left, and the mummy does the same.
Hm?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Pepe jumps backwards, and the mummy does the same, making a loud noise as it hits the wall behind it.
Pfft.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Looks like you can move your arms and legs, but not your brains.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Hey, if we can move in unison...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: An idea comes to Pepe as she looks at Anat, who still lies passed out on the ground.
Almost to the curator's office. Alright, follow my movements and make a turn here.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: (Turns right)
attributes.name: Nameless Mummy

attributes.content: Gotta get it to hold Anat's shoulder tighter. She almost fell just now. Let's see...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: (Moves right hand)
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: (Grabs Anat's shoulder)
attributes.name: Nameless Mummy

attributes.content: (Frowns unconsciously)
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Alright. Now follow me...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: (Moans unconsciously)
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Maybe we should take smaller steps...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I'll consider that a yes.
attributes.name: Pepe
Pepe
attributes.content: Very good...

attributes.name: Pepe
attributes.content: Wait, no, no, no—!
The mummy steps on the hem of its own robe and falls forward, right on top of Anat's tiny frame.
(Groans unconsciously)
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: That red mark on her face isn't going away for a while...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Oh, you genius.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Come on, hold her tightly this time.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: (Frowns unconsciously)
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Walk with me. Not too fast, not too slow. Good... one-two... one-two...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Take it slow and easy. We're almost there.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Pepe turns her head to find her pass lying on the floor. It must have fallen out of her pocket.
She looks at her own raised arms, then at the mummy's holding Anat.
If the mummy let go, it would drop Anat on her head...
How do I get into the office like this?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I can't use my hands... I have to use my foot...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: (Reaches out one foot)
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: (Reaches out one foot)
attributes.name: Nameless Mummy

attributes.content: Good, keep your balance.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Still can't reach it. I wish I didn't skip gym class...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Come on, you can do it!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Argh—
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Despite trying her best, the pass still lies just beyond Pepe's reach.
She stretches a little too far and loses her balance.
Following her lead, the mummy lets go of Anat and falls in the same way.
Pepe can only watch as Anat's skull hits the floor, making a dull sound on impact.
(Unconscious cry)
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Sorry, Anat, I'll give you my full support on your next research project.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Hanimefendi, do you need help?
attributes.name: Wandering Staff

attributes.content: Oh, I'm so glad you're here. Your curator isn't feeling well. Can you help me carry her into the office?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Wandering Staff

attributes.content: I set Curator Anat on the sofa. Your posture is... interesting. Are you sure you don't need help getting up?
attributes.name: Wandering Staff

attributes.content: No, it's a special exercise I do.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Er, okay. What about the exhibit? Should I carry it inside too?
attributes.name: Wandering Staff

attributes.content: No, I can handle it on my own.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Alright... let me know if you need anything else.
attributes.name: Wandering Staff

attributes.content: I can finally move... that was close.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Stop staring and come in.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Good news, Narantuya, I found the target.
attributes.name: Wandering Staff

attributes.content: Yeah, near Hall Four. I helped her carry the unconscious curator into the office.
attributes.name: Wandering Staff

attributes.content: I'm certain she's in the office. There's no one else, other than the curator who's still out cold. I also have her pass.
attributes.name: Wandering Staff

attributes.content: No problem, I'll wait here for you.
attributes.name: Wandering Staff

attributes.content: Izaja?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Oh, Medjehtiqedti Hanimefendi, I...
attributes.name: Wandering Staff

attributes.content: What are you doing here, with the whole museum in chaos?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: We're shutting things down for the day. Help lead these lost guests out.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: What's going on? Where are we going?
attributes.name: Lost Tourist

attributes.content: Are we in danger?
attributes.name: Lost Tourist

attributes.content: Don't worry, just follow our staff here and she'll take you to a safe place.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: B-But I have other things to do...
attributes.name: Wandering Staff

attributes.content: Alright, I will—
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Look out!
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Wh-What happened?!
attributes.name: Lost Tourist

attributes.content: Who brought a cloudbeast in here? Pets aren't allowed in the museum!
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: I-I didn't see any cloudbeasts...
attributes.name: Wandering Staff

attributes.content: We'll talk about your negligence later. I've got to catch it before someone steps on it.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: ...I guess I'm guiding the tourists outside.
attributes.name: Wandering Staff

attributes.content: (Mutter) Well, I think I can still make it.
attributes.name: Wandering Staff

attributes.content: Follow me, everyone. The exit is this way, to the right.
attributes.name: Wandering Staff

attributes.content: Isn't that the left?
attributes.name: Lost Tourist

attributes.content: She's staff here, I'm sure she knows what she's doing... hey, wait for us!
attributes.name: Lost Tourist

attributes.content: A heavy exhibition hall door is pushed open, then closed again.
No one remembers that it should be open, no one cares that it was opened, and no one has cleaned the dusty sign that reads 'Northeastern Tributary Exhibit' in ages.
The hall is silent.
Aspasia's heart thumps against her chest, almost loud enough to drown out her whispering footsteps.
She passes by the black monuments of lost tribes and colorful Kjerag rugs, casting her gaze towards the dark depths of the hall.
...Finally.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Our history awaits me in silence.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: I must admit that one should look upon history with such solemnity.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: From which lost temple's relief was the scroll before me drawn? From which Minoan peak was such immaculately white marble hewn?
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: And such imagination, piecing together a corner of an ancient Minoan family with ancient artifacts.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: It's all wrong!
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: I recognize you, the golden goblet that once sat in the center of the temple. My grandfather came to visit you, many years ago, as did my mother after him.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Much has my family suffered for your loss.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Why has this museum put it among the clay bowls for fermented milk? They share no common material or style!
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: And where is the other half of the pair? The Sargonians took them all, yet they do not keep them safe!
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Even the exhibit description is—
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: She takes a long look at the exhibit label, then pulls the metal plate off the wall and looks to the other side.
Both sides are perfectly smooth, with only her own reflection upon them.
Signómi, this one was just left empty.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: —But the biggest mistake is that these artifacts are here at all.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: A century ago, Minos suffered the shame of Sargonian armies violating her soil, trampling on our civilization and history.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: It should not have been so...
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: I must take them.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Follow this flight of stairs down, and you'll find the exit.
attributes.name: Wandering Staff

attributes.content: Now then, I have other business to attend to.
attributes.name: Wandering Staff

attributes.content: Something still doesn't feel right.
attributes.name: Lost Tourist

attributes.content: I don't think this is how we came in.
attributes.name: Bewildered Tourist

attributes.content: She's staff here. She knows what she's doing... right?
attributes.name: Lost Tourist

attributes.content: Will this way really take us home?
attributes.name: Lost Tourist

attributes.content: I must take you home.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: I must bring you to the priests of Minos, that they may study and preserve you.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Aspasia walks solemnly towards the exhibition pedestal and lifts the goblet.
Minoan artifacts must not be allowed to lie forgotten in this forsaken, sunless hall.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Don't push! I can't see where I'm going. Shouldn't they put an underground light or something in the emergency exit?
attributes.name: Lost Tourist

attributes.content: Hey, there's a lady there setting up the exhibit. She looks more reliable than the other one. Let's ask her!
attributes.name: Lost Tourist

attributes.content: Have you come to see—
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: —Is this the way out of the museum?
attributes.name: Lost Tourist

attributes.content: Is there something I can help you with?
attributes.name: Aspasia
